body_html:
Looks like it. Forwarding the issue to @benoitsteiner, since he added them.

(FWIW, in my opinion it should be an error to change the shape of a variable once it's created with a fully-defined shape... i.e. tf.Variable(..., validate_shape=True). If I remember correctly, the shape-changing ops were grandfathered in and never reconciled with tf.Variable.)
body_text:
Looks like it. Forwarding the issue to @benoitsteiner, since he added them.
(FWIW, in my opinion it should be an error to change the shape of a variable once it's created with a fully-defined shape... i.e. tf.Variable(..., validate_shape=True). If I remember correctly, the shape-changing ops were grandfathered in and never reconciled with tf.Variable.)
body:
Looks like it. Forwarding the issue to @benoitsteiner, since he added them.

(FWIW, in my opinion it should be an error to change the shape of a variable once it's created with a fully-defined shape... i.e. `tf.Variable(..., validate_shape=True)`. If I remember correctly, the shape-changing ops were grandfathered in and never reconciled with `tf.Variable`.)
